meanings.definition: The condition of having a relatively long head.
meanings.sent1: The dolichocephaly of the ancient skull amazed the researchers.
meanings.sent2: His dolichocephaly made him easily recognizable in a crowd.
meanings.sent3: The dolichocephaly of the alien in the movie made it look quite unique.
meanings.sent4: Her dolichocephaly was like a ship sailing through the sea of people.
meanings.sent5: The dolichocephaly of the giraffe's skull helps it reach high leaves.

meanings.definition: A person with a dolichocephalic skull shape.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a dolichocephaly of an ancient human.
meanings.sent2: She studied the dolichocephaly of different individuals in history.
meanings.sent3: The dolichocephaly in the costume party stood out among the round heads.
meanings.sent4: His dolichocephaly was like a puzzle piece fitting perfectly in history.
meanings.sent5: The dolichocephaly of the statue made it seem wise and ancient.
